title: Watch: Mathieu van der Poel Crashes, Somersaults Over Bars, DNFs in Mountain Bike Disaster
content:
Two crashes in opening laps mark rough comeback to mountain bike for cobblestone king in road toward Tour de France and MTB worlds.

Read the full article at Watch: Mathieu van der Poel Crashes, Somersaults Over Bars, DNFs in Mountain Bike Disaster on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
